CustomField.description: This field is populated with the Case's account ID (used for the lookup). When the account ID is present, this field acts as a flag to populate the case in the Flagged Case Related List on the Account record.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field is populated with the Case's account ID (used for the lookup). When the account ID is present, this field acts as a flag to populate the case in the Flagged Case Related List on the Account record.
CustomField.label: Flagged Account
